Keystone Gazette
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Waynesboro, Pa. Each issue includes section: Blue Ridge Zephyr. Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Franklin County -- Waynesboro ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Waynesboro

group.title: Elizabethville Echo
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Elizabethville, Pa. Began in 1893; ceased Jan. 7, 1972. Merged with: Williamstown times, and: Millersburg sentinel, to form: Upper Dauphin sentinel. Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Dauphin County -- Elizabethville ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Elizabethville

group.title: Elk Enterprise
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of St. Mary's, Pa. Ceased in 1915. Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Elk County -- Saint Mary's ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Saint Mary's ; Newspapers -- Agriculture ; Agriculture newspapers

group.title: Lebanon Advertiser
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Lebanon, Pa. Ceased in 1901. Merged with: Star (Lebanon, Pa.), to form: Star-advertiser (Lebanon, Pa.). Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Lebanon County -- Lebanon ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Lebanon

group.title: Mapleton Advertiser
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Mapleton Depot, Pa. Published every Saturday. Run may have issues missing.

group.title: Mapleton Item
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Mapleton Depot, Pa. Published every Wednesday. Ceased in 1920? Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Huntingdon County -- Mapleton Depot ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Mapleton Depot ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Huntingdon County -- Mapleton ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Mapleton

group.title: Mercer Dispatch
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Mercer, Pa. Began in 1865. Ceased in Jan. 1887. Continues: Whig and dispatch. Merged with: Mercer Republican (Mercer, Pa.), to form: Dispatch and Republican. Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Mercer County -- Mercer ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Mercer

group.title: Titusville Courier
group.description: A weekly newspaper from the small community of Titusville, Pa. Began in 1898; ceased in 1912. Titusville herald (Titusville, Pa. : 1900 : Weekly), and: Titusville evening courier, daily, interchanged circulation and "good will", selling exclusive rights for weekly circulation to Titusville courier, and for daily to Titusville herald, August 1911. Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Crawford County -- Titusville ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Titusville

group.title: Titusville Herald
group.description: A newspaper from the small community of Titusville, Pa. It was issued semiweekly from September 4, 1900 to September 1904. Then it was issued weekly from September 9, 1904 to August 31, 1911. Titusville herald (Titusville, Pa. : 1900 : Weekly), and Titusville evening courier, daily, interchanged circulation and "good will," selling exclusive rights for weekly circulation to Titusville courier, and for daily circulation to Titusville herald, August 1911. Run may have issues missing.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Crawford County -- Titusville ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Titusville

group.title: Wilkes-Barre Daily
group.description: A newspaper from the city of Wilkes-Barre, Pa. It was issued daily except Sundays. Began June 6, 1872. Ceased in 1873? A weekly edition was also published called the Luzerne union. In 1873 publisher began a new numbering.
group.subject: Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Luzerne County -- Wilkes-Barre ; Newspapers -- Pennsylvania -- Wilkes-Barre
